indications: Intravenous solutions containing sodium chloride are indicated for parenteral replenishment of fluid and sodium chloride as required by the clinical condition of the patient.
contraindications:
The dose is dependent upon the age, weight and clinical condition of the patient. 
                   Additives may be incompatible. Consult with pharmacist, if available. When introducing additives, use aseptic technique, mix thoroughly and do not store. 
                   Parenteral drug products should be inspected visually for particulate matter and discoloration prior to administration, whenever solution and container permit (see 
                        PRECAUTIONS
                     ).
warningsAndPrecautions:
0.9% Sodium Chloride Injection, USP is supplied in single-dose flexible plastic containers as follows:
